title: The crucial role of hydrogen bonding in shaping the structures of zinc-based coordination polymers using tridentate N, N, O donor reduced Schiff base ligands and bridging acetates
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,13905-13914
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00550C, Paper

Puspendu Middya, Antonio Frontera, Shouvik Chattopadhyay
In this article synthesis, characterization and DFT study of two polynuclear zinc(II) complexes with reduced Schiff base have been reported.
